text:
same here, actually! At first I assumed animators were given one character to animate instead of a shot. It makes sense that if you do good work with a specific character, you're given more scenes with that specific one though.
Ahh, I see, it does make sense that we'd need to at least show that we're open to progress to higher positions.
Oh, ok. So in a way the animation directors do less animating and more managing than a "regular" animator would, then?
Thank you for your help! :grin: I don't have any specific questions right now, but is there a place online where you share your work? I'd love to take a look at things you're doing!
